name: Brocco-Lee, Eat me if you can
name_original: Brocco-Lee, Eat me if you can
description:
In this game made for #IndieDevDayGameJam by two people ( when tey weren't at work ) you play as a Broccoli who fights vs the cooks who want to cook you for the next dinner!

How many cooks will you send to fly tonight?
